name: robotCleanerOption_setValue
description: This function is used to set the cleaning options for a robot vacuum cleaner.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the cleaning options.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The mode to set for the cleaning options.
